response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This exceptional offer is designed to recognize your potential as a discerning buyer and to ensure that you have the chance to experience the true worth of this item. Should you choose to accept this offer, it would not only be a mutually beneficial transaction but also a testament to our shared appreciation for quality and excellence. Please let me know if you require any further information or assistance in making your decision.", "product_price": 750000}
